languages.text: "Покладист{mf|ый мальчик|ая девочка}. Что ж, тогда ступай к Стражу на вратах Камеры Патента и исполни свою судьбу. Я надеялся, что скормлю машине Эдельтрада — в конце концов, именно он приглянулся Теодоре — но раз я не смог его раздобыть, сгодишься и ты".

traits.locale_text: "Покладист{mf|ый мальчик|ая девочка}. Что ж, тогда ступай к Стражу на вратах Камеры Патента и исполни свою судьбу. Я надеялся, что скормлю машине Эдельтрада — в конце концов, именно он приглянулся Теодоре — но раз я не смог его раздобыть, сгодишься и ты".

languages.text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."
languages.original_text: "Покладист{mf|ый мальчик|ая девочка}. Что ж, тогда ступай к Стражу на вратах Камеры Патента и исполни свою судьбу. Я надеялся, что скормлю машине Эдельтрада — в конце концов, именно он приглянулся Теодоре — но раз я не смог его раздобыть, сгодишься и ты".

traits.locale_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

"There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

"There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

"There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

"There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

languages.text: “真是个好{mf|小伙子|姑娘}。去授状大厅门口的哨兵那里，完成你的使命吧。我本打算将艾德萨德的血喂给那台机器，毕竟，当初是他引起了西奥多拉的注意。不过，说服他配合非常困难，所以这个任务只能由你来完成了。”
languages.original_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

traits.locale_text: “真是个好{mf|小伙子|姑娘}。去许可证大厅门口的哨兵那里，完成你的使命吧。我本打算将艾德萨德的血喂给那台机器，毕竟，当初是他引起了西奥多拉的注意。不过，说服他配合非常困难，所以这个任务只能由你来完成了。”

languages.text: «Buen{mf||a} chic{mf|o|a}. Dirígete a las puertas de la sala de la Patente y preséntate ante el centinela para cumplir con tu destino. Esperaba alimentar a la máquina con Edelthrad, ya que fue el que llamó la atención de Theodora, pero ya que es difícil de atrapar, tendré que contentarme contigo».
languages.original_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

traits.locale_text: «Buen{mf||a} chic{mf|o|a}. Dirígete a las puertas de la sala de la Patente y preséntate ante el centinela para cumplir con tu destino. Esperaba alimentar a la máquina con Edelthrad, ya que fue el que llamó la atención de Theodora, pero ya que es difícil de atrapar, tendré que contentarme contigo».

languages.text: 「いい子だ。それから、令状部屋の門にあるセンチネルに行き、お前の運命を果たすんだ。一応、機械のえさにしようと考えていたのはシオドーラの目に留まったエデルスラドだったが、あいつを捕まえるのは難しいことがわかったから、お前がやるしかないんだ」
languages.original_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

traits.locale_text: 「いい子がいる。それから、令状部屋の門にあるセンチネルに行き、お前の運命を果たすんだ。私はエデルスラドを機械のえさにしたいと思っていたんだが。セオドラの目に留まったのはあいつだからだ。だが、あいつを調達するのは難しいことがわかったから、お前がやるしかないんだ」
「いい子だ。それから、令状部屋の門にあるセンチネルに行き、お前の運命を果たすんだ。一応、機械のえさにしようと考えていたのはシオドーラの目に留まったエデルスラドだったが、あいつを捕まえるのは難しいことがわかったから、お前がやるしかないんだ」

languages.text: « Voilà ce que je voulais entendre. Dans ce cas, approchez de la sentinelle de la porte et accomplissez votre destinée. J'espérais sacrifier Edelthrad à cette machine, puisque c'est lui qui avait les faveurs de Théodora, mais lui mettre la main dessus s'est révélé difficile. Je vais donc devoir me contenter de vous. »
languages.original_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà ce que je voulais entendre. Dans ce cas, approchez de la sentinelle de la porte et accomplissez votre destinée. J'espérais sacrifier Edelthrad à cette machine, puisque c'est lui qui avait les faveurs de Théodora, mais lui mettre la main dessus s'est révélé difficile. Je vais donc devoir me contenter de vous. »

languages.text: "{mf|Guter Junge|Braves Mädchen}. Dann geht jetzt zu dem Wächter an den Toren der Handelsbriefkammer und erfüllt Euer Schicksal. Ich hatte eigentlich gehofft, Edelthrad an die Maschine zu verfüttern – immerhin hat er Theodoras Aufmerksamkeit erregt –, aber da es sich als schwierig erwiesen hat, ihn herzubringen, nehme ich mit Euch vorlieb."
languages.original_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Guter Junge|Braves Mädchen}. Dann geht jetzt zu dem Wächter an den Toren der Handelsbriefkammer und erfüllt Euer Schicksal. Ich hatte eigentlich gehofft, Edelthrad an die Maschine zu verfüttern – immerhin hat er Theodoras Aufmerksamkeit erregt –, aber da es sich als schwierig erwiesen hat, ihn herzubringen, nehme ich mit Euch vorlieb."

languages.original_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

languages.text: "Ha şöyle, uslu {mf|çocuk|kız} ol. O hâlde derhâl Ruhsatname Odası'nın kapısındaki Nöbetçi'ye git ve kaderinde yazanı gerçekleştir. Aslında niyetim makineye Edelthrad'ı vermekti. Ne de olsa Theodora'nın gözüne çarpan o. Ama onu getirmek zor olacağı için seninle idare edeceğiz artık."
languages.original_text: "There's a good {mf|boy|girl}. Then go to the Sentinel at the gates of the Warrant Chamber and fulfil your destiny. I had hoped to feed Edelthrad to the machine — he is the one who caught Theodora's eye, after all — but since procuring him has proved difficult, you will have to do."

traits.locale_text: "Ha şöyle, uslu {mf|çocuk|kız} ol. O hâlde derhâl Ruhsatname Odası'nın kapısındaki Nöbetçi'ye git ve kaderinde yazanı gerçekleştir. Aslında niyetim makineye Edelthrad'ı vermekti. Ne de olsa Theodora'nın gözüne çarpan o. Ama onu getirmek zor olacağı için seninle idare edeceğiz artık."
